thread.title: Women's Equality Party calls on the Government to scrap married couple’s allowance
thread.title_full: Women's Equality Party calls on the Government to scrap married couple’s allowance - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Women's Equality Party calls on the Government to scrap married couple’s allowance
text: The Women’s Equality Party (WEP) is to press the Government to scrap the married couple’s allowance, just six months after its introduction, and put £800m of savings into helping victims of domestic and sexual abuse. The party, co-founded by the television presenter Sandi Toksvig and Prince Charles biographer Catherine Mayer in March, will provide details of the plan at its formal policy launch on Tuesday. Read more
